articles.author: Ron Miller
articles.title: Google goes all in on generative AI at Google Cloud Next - TechCrunch
articles.description: Google hosted its customer conference this week in Las Vegas, and it was completely focused on generative AI announcements.
articles.content: This week in Las Vegas, 30,000 folks came together to hear the latest and greatest from Google Cloud. What they heard was all generative AI, all the time. Google Cloud is first and foremost a cloud i… [+7434 chars]

articles.title: Donald Trump in Line for Massive Bonus Even as Trump Media (DJT) Slumps - Bloomberg
articles.description: A rocky start for Trump Media & Technology Group Corp. shares has wiped out $4.5 billion in market value in just a couple of weeks. But it will have to lose a lot more than that to put at risk the massive special bonus due to the former president and his …

articles.title: Google CEO Sundar Pichai’s shares “awe-inspiring” picture of solar eclipse shot from this smartphone - The Times of India
articles.description: TECH NEWS News: Sundar Pichai praised #TeamPixel's eclipse photos. Google created a special eclipse animation. Elon Musk shared eclipse videos. NASA provided eclipse
